content.full_text: Check of Abraham Lincoln to W. W. Watson and Son, 19 December 18551 Springfield Marine and Fire Insurance Co., Pay toW. W. Watson & Sonor Bearer,Fortyone &72/100Dollars In Current Bank Bills. $4172/1002
paragraphs: Check of Abraham Lincoln to W. W. Watson and Son, 19 December 18551 Springfield Marine and Fire Insurance Co., Pay toW. W. Watson & Sonor Bearer,Fortyone &72/100Dollars In Current Bank Bills. $4172/1002
citations: Harry E. Pratt,The Personal Finances of Abraham Lincoln(Springfield, IL: The Abraham Lincoln Association, 1943), 92.

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln filled out this partially printed document.

2Although it is uncertain what Lincoln purchased, such a large amount of money to W.
                  W. Watson & Son, a confectionery, suggests a large gathering or party.Harry E. Pratt,The Personal Finances of Abraham Lincoln(Springfield, IL: The Abraham Lincoln Association, 1943), 92.
